title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.3 - Conditions for starting claimed horse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4230.3 - Conditions for starting claimed horse

State Regulations

If a horse is claimed it shall not start in a claiming
race for a period of 30 days from the date of claim for less than 25 percent
more than the amount for which it was claimed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4230.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
